text: The 1997 Division Two Championship season was the third tier of British rugby league during the 1997 season. ==Championship== The league was won by Hunslet Hawks, winning promotion to Division One along with Rochdale Hornets and Leigh Centurions. ===League table=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=20 abbr="Position" | !width=175 |Team !width=20 abbr="Played" |Pld !width=20 abbr="Won" |W !width=20 abbr="Drawn" |D !width=20 abbr="Lost" |L !width=20 abbr="Points for" |PF !width=20 abbr="Points against" |PA !width=20 abbr="Points" |Pts |- style="background:#FFD700;" |1||style="text- align:left;"|Hunslet Hawks |20||15||0||5||682||256||30 |- style="background:#CCFFCC;" |2||style="text-align:left;"|Rochdale Hornets |20||15||0||5||680||347||30 |- style="background:#CCFFCC;" |3||style="text- align:left;"|Leigh Centurions |20||15||0||5||546||346||30 |- |4||style="text- align:left;"|Batley Bulldogs |20||14||0||6||600||435||28 |- |5||style="text- align:left;"|Carlisle Border Raiders |20||13||0||7||564||384||26 |- |6||style="text-align:left;"|Lancashire Lynx |20||12||0||8||552||393||24 |- |7||style="text-align:left;"|York Wasps |20||8||0||12||502||517||16 |- |8||style="text-align:left;"|Barrow Braves |20||7||0||13||335||632||14 |- |9||style="text-align:left;"|Bramley |20||5||1||14||353||513||11 |- |10||style="text-align:left;"|Doncaster Dragons |20||3||1||16||247||668||7 |- |11||style="text-align:left;"|Prescot Panthers |20||2||0||18||247||817||4 |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" |bgcolor="#FFD700"|Champions |bgcolor="#CCFFCC"|Promoted |} ==See also== *Super League war *1997 Challenge Cup ==References== ==External links== * *1997 season at wigan.rlfans.com Category:RFL League 1 RFL Division Two
